messages.title: Your choice on 8th June:
messages.content: Liberal Democrat MPs fighting to stop hard Brexit wrecking Britain. OR A Labour party that voted with UKIP to back an extreme Brexit.

messages.title: The Conservatives are out of the race in Cambridge.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives are out of the race in Cambridge. Voting Conservative here helps Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrat MPs fighting to stop hard Brexit wrecking Britain.
